title: Dragon Sounds Pro
description: 183 Premium Dragon SFX That will take your game to the next level!
longDescription:
> Listen Here <

> View The Full File List <

* Add $15 and get our Ultimate SFX Bundle (3548 Sounds) which includes all of our current and future packs! *


In this pack you will find 183 sounds (+ free future updates) which were carefully chosen out of 100s of sounds we recorded. All sounds are game ready and were designed to bring dragons to life!


The Pack Includes:

  • Dragon Attacks
  • Dragon Breathing Fire
  • Dragon Flying Sounds (Taking Flight, Landing, Flapping Wings)
  • Dragon Footsteps
  • Dragon Roars
  • Dragon Bites
  • Dragon Deaths
  • Dragon Aggro
  • Dragon Breathing
  • Dragon Hisses
  • Dragon Screech
  • Dragon Eating
  • Baby Dragon (Breathing Fire, Roar, Taking Damage, Footsteps)


Hope you enjoy this pack and good luck with your game :)
